creator: tjsb@slb.com
text:
The component reference Control Panel section is being added even for 
Functions, which don't have control panel screenshots.

The patch to follow fixes that, as well as an old(?) bug whereby the Control 
Panel heading is output even if there is no screenshot attribute.

Created attachment 6822
omit screenshot / control panel section if not required
creator: tjsb@slb.com
